title: Halfway v1.2.0
description:
Halfway v1.2.0


Extract 7zip & play!


This is a major content update which delivers modding support with Steam Workshop integration, modding tools, multiple save slots, and a new difficulty mode to the game. 


Changes:

    Modding support & modding tools have been added. Mods can be published to and shared with Steam Workshop.
    A "Game Mode +" mod has been introduced which adds a new level of difficulty to the game.
    Added multiple save slots.
    Various minor mission adjustments and bug fixes
